unnormalised: Okay, koni maka gastroenterology vixim vicharle. Bare, hanv kitlean suru korum? Kalpna kor tor tumchi pachan sanstha rush hour-acher asleli Mumbai local train bhaxen asa. Gondhol zal'lo, khub lok bhorlele, ani tumi tumchea gontvyak (…uh… toilet) pavche khatir prarthana kortat. Tem gastroenterology-achem ek nanne rup. Ami ti train (relativly) smooth cholovpak yatn korpi mechanics.
normalised: okey, mhunnlear konnem mhaka gastroenterology vixim proxn kelo. sarkhem, hanv khoim suru korum? chintun polleat tumchem pachon manddlonn Mumbai local sarkhem rush hour-ant asa. avyvasthit, gurdyent bhorlam, ani tumi fokot prarthona kortat tumi tumchea thanak vochpachem… uh… toilet. tem gastroenterology ekach utrant. ami te mechanic zavn asat zaka ami to train (relativly) surlit choloyta.

unnormalised: Dekh, hanv ek asli Dr. nhoi vo kitem nhoi, punn mhojea mama, Sharma mamak, soglleancher *opinions* aslet, tantunt tanchi pachanuy aspavtalem. Te isabgol ani jaljeera-chea ek concoction-acher sopoth ghetale. Te sangtale "monsoon uprant BMC drain-a poros bore teren saf kortale." Maka recipe vichar naka, tumka plumbing service-achi goroz poddli zalear hanv zobabdar nhoi.
normalised: polleat, hanv ek asli D-r vo kitem tori nhoi, punn mhozo mama, mama sharma, taka soglleancher vichar asle, tachea pachonacheruy. isabgol ani jaljeera misrannacher xirap dilem. mhonnlem tem "monsoon zalea uprant B-M-C drain poros chodd saf korta." mhaka recipe vixim proxn korunk naka, hanv jababdar nhoi tumkam plumbing service-achi goroz poddli zalear.

unnormalised: Basically, gastroenterology tumchea esophagus-anlean (jea tubant tumi pani puri gilltat) sokol, borench, tumka khobor asa titlench deal korta. Acid reflux (zori tumi khub biryani khalea uprant tim dukan dukhta), irritable bowel syndrome (IBS – tumcho colleague *sodanch* loo-nt astolo tachem karonn), ulcers (ouch!), ani colon cancer bhaxen asleo serious vostunchem chintun.
normalised: mukhya rupan, gastroenterology tumchea esophagus thavn (to noll jeantum tumi tumchi pani puri gil'tat) khala, sarkhem, tumkam kollta. acid reflux chintat (jeatum tumi chodd biryani khalea uprant unneachem dista), irritable bowel syndrome (I-B-S – tumchea sobat kam korpi monis kiteak toilet-ant asta), ulcers (ouch!), ani chodd gambhir vostu jeasy colon cancer.

unnormalised: Eka sadharan problemak ami deal kortat tem acidity. Disunk yeta ki 70% Bhartak acidity asa. Ani tem "tikhat jevnachea" dolleant martat. Joxe, dost, hanven tuka vindaloo khalea uprant tin gulab jamun khavtana dekhlem. Asli zat. Gareb mirsank dolos diunk soddat naka. Thode ENO vaprat. Seriously, vaprat.
normalised: ami sadharanponnan jheltat ti ek vishay mhonnlear acidity. dista tea pormannem, satt tori xekddo bharoti lok acidity bhogtat. ani tankam “tikhat jevnna” cher dosh ditalem. sarkhem, sangati, hanvem tumkam teen gulab jamun vindaloo zalea uprant khatai astana dekhle. asli zatam. dukh divpi mirsangecher dosh divop sodd. kitem tori E-N-O vaporun polle. gambhirponnan, fokot vaporun polle.

unnormalised: Ani uprant asa colonoscopy. Hanv tor sangtam ti ek "experience". Tumchi sanstha saf korun tache khatir tumi toyari kortat. Sadharanponni tem diluted dukhi bhaxen disunk yetat tea gallon (vo chodd liter) kitem tori pievpachem aspavta. Uprant tumi bhitor voitat, ani konn tori tumchem vhoddem intestine camera vaprun check korta. Maja yetat. Punn seriously, tem important, khas korun tumi 45 vorsam voir asat vo tumchea familic colon cancer-acho history asa tor.
normalised: uparant colonoscopy asa. ami mhonnunk xaktat tem ek “anubhav” asa. tumi tachi toyari tumchea system-ak saf korun kortat. sadharanponnan ek gallon (vo kitlim tori liters) kitem tori pivpant asa jem niraxepann sarkhem dista. magir tumi bhitor vetat, ani konn tori tumchem vhoddem antddem camera-n check korta. anandaacho vell. punn gambhirponnan, tem gorjechem, khas korun tumi challis panch vorsam poros voir astat vo colon cancer-achi family history asa.

unnormalised: Atam, hanv tumka "Helicobacter pylori" vo "endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography" bhaxen aslea medical jargons-an bore korcho nhoi. Tem Google kiteak asa. Punn tumi fokot yaad dovrat, tumchem gut important asa. Tak borench treat korat. Dar disa butter chicken diun bore korat naka (hem korunk sopem nhoi, hanv zannam). Khub udok pieyat. Ani Devan khatir, tumi WhatsApp-acher "detox teas" vixim vachun sodankall soty mantat tem bond korat. Tumka asleo asli problem asat zalear ek asli gastroenterologist-ak mellat, joxe Max Hospital-antlea Dr. Reddy-k.
normalised: atanch hanv tumkam daktori utram sangun bore korcho na jeas “helicobacter pylori” vo “endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography.” tem google-chea kamachem. punn fokot ugddas dovrat, tumchem pott gorjechem asa. tankam borem zoxem vagoi. tankam butter chicken-chea bhorpannacher dhados korunaka (sovem mhonnop sompem, hanv zannam). purem udok piya. ani devachea mogakhatir, whatsapp-acher “detox teas” vixim vachtat tea soglleancher xevtt dhorop soddun diat. asli gastroenterologist polle, jeasy D-r reddy max hospital-ant, tumkam asli problem asa zalear.

unnormalised: Tor, hantun tumi sangunk zata, ki gastroenterology ek khushi bhurpa, borech ramblchea, nanne rupant asa. Atam tumhi sangtale zalear hanv somosas khatole, jena tumhi tumchea bhovnank dukhtale ani soglle hanv uloupak zanna zalear chukicho ashi zatale. Irony, eh?
normalised: mhunnlear, hovui, tem gastroenterology ekuch hansi rupan, nischit rupan bhalta rupan, ekuch utrant mhonnlear. atam tumi maf kortole zalear, mhaka samosa khavpachi aas asa, jem xokta heart burn-ak pavoyta ani mhunnlem tem soglem chuk mhunn sidh korta. irony, eh?
